sub_title: SAP EWM WM LE @ Bolders Consulting Group
summary:
Manish Bhavsar is Creative, result driven Supply chain consultant with deep expertise in system design, development and delivery of complex projects and high-performance solutions. He is passionate about conducting Requirement gathering workshops and designing end to end efficient futuristic business process and drive its realization.  For him SAP EWM implementation is not the implementation of IT system but the transformation of Distribution center and supply chain of the organization.

During 15 years of SAP Consulting career, he has completed 6 end to end SAP EWM implementations, multi country rollouts for SAP WM/LE and AMS for EWM/WM/LE in various geographical location i.e. Denmark, USA, Germany, UK, Poland, UAE and India for clients from different industries such as Retail, Fashion, Automobile, Manufacturing, Textile, Telecom, Pharmaceutical and Chemical. 

He has deep expertise in broad range of SAP EWM functionalities i.e. Wave Management, Two Step picking, Material flow system, Labor management, Packing Profile, Integration with Transportation management system, Process oriented storage control, Warehouse billing, Inbound process, Replenishment strategies, Physical inventory, Production integration, Integration with Pick by light/Put by light systems, Training the Superuser and end user, Stabilizing the new implementation. 

He has worked on many sales pursuits, prepared competitive implementation proposal, system demo for key stakeholders and won the contracts.

He has strong customer focus with constant endeavor to deliver value to the client and has been trusted adviser to his clients. He works with the philosophy that system shall handle All business requirements including most challenging one, but it must be easy for the end user to use it. He enjoys the art of maximizing standard functionality with minimum system modification.

education.field_of_study: Logistics, Materials, and Supply Chain Management

school.name: JAI HIND ET'S ZULAL BHILAJIRAO PATIL COLLEGE, DHULE.

certifications.name: Top Scorer SAP Challenge Europe 2023 by Deloitte

he has completed 6 end to end SAP EWM implementations till date.
He has deep expertise in broad range of SAP EWM functionalities i.e. Wave Management, Two Step picking, Material flow system, Labor management, Packing Profile, Integration with Transportation management system, Process oriented storage control, Warehouse billing, Inbound process, Replenishment strategies, Physical inventory, Production interface, Integration with Pick by light/Put by light systems, Training the Superuser and end user, Stabilizing the new implementation.

contributors.headline: SAP EWM WM LE @ Bolders Consulting Group

projects.title: Denmark Go live and Support for Retail Client
projects.description:
Denmark business runs multiple retails chains as mentioned in the client profile. From warehousing perspective it meant many fold increase in order types and also introduction of different order scenario like special orders canteen, delicacies, and campaign orders.

Manish contribution was breakthrough idea to use activity area for WCU storage type and different activity types to meet the complex business requirement.

Another contribution was to set up consignment stock pick in EWM.

Manish setup new EWM box for production server and its connection to ECC system. ECC was connected to 3 different EWM boxes.

contributors.headline: SAP EWM WM LE @ Bolders Consulting Group

projects.title: Germany Go live  and Support for Retail Client
projects.description:
EWM solution was built to work with external WMS (ANT - system that controlled the conveyors and flow of goods). System landscape involved ECC-EWM-ANT.
Below functionality was built 
Receiving Goods: 
1.	To send information needed by external WMS (ANT) like TU, license plate
2.	To create work packages (warehouse orders) as per the need of external WMS (one warehouse order per inbound delivery)
3.	Build custom solution to take over gatehouse function
4.	Build interface for door change
5.	Build interface to Support excess/short confirmation

Delivery to store:
1.	To create work packages as per the need external warehouse (one warehouse order to contain the task for one order type)
2.	Build interface to receive confirmation per pick pallet
3.	Build interface to receive excess/short confirmation
4.	Build logic in external WMS to capture packaging material info like euro pallet, potato box, cool box
5.	Work with external vendor to decide the timing when pallet information is sent to EWM

Other interfaces to facilitate stock comparison, vendor return, return from stores, stock adjustment. Interface to send article master to external WMS.

To define file structure to capture stock information from external WMS and do physical inventory using file upload.

Test all interfaces with external WMS and work with external vendor to correct the errors and make sure correct idoc information for every business scenario like happy flow/ excess/ short confirmation/ Cross HU.

Manish set up new SAP EWM box for quality testing, regression testing and production and its connection with ECC system. Production ECC system was connected to 2 EWM boxes.

Solution to keep track of packaging material sent from Distribution center to the stores.

contributors.headline: SAP EWM WM LE @ Bolders Consulting Group

projects.title: Multi Contry Rollout for Merck Damstadt
projects.description: Manish worked as a lead consultant for Logistics Execution. It was rollout of Merck ERP TEMPO template to 6 countries i.e.Uruguay, Poland, Canada, USA, Italy and Switzerland.  Global TEMPO template processes in OTC, P2P, DTS, MTS and ATR areas implemented to above countries. The DaVinci TEMPO methodology involved 2 different phase models  to facilitate a project rollout in 33 weeks or 42 weeks depending on the complexity.

contributors.headline: SAP EWM WM LE @ Bolders Consulting Group

projects.title: Wyeth Pharmaceuticals, USA, Warehouse and Distribution Team
projects.description:
Wyeth is a global leader in pharmaceuticals, consumer health care products, and animal health care products. Wyeth products are sold in more than 100 countries. Wyeth revenue in Y 2007 was USD 22.4 billion.
I worked on Decentralized SAP WM. This was new system by SAP to handle the requirement of high capacity warehouses. Manish’s involvement in this project was lead functional consultant for Warehouse and Distribution team.

profile_positions.title: EWM/WM/LE/TM Solution Architect and Functional Consultant

profile_positions.description:
	Solution architect for SAP EWM System Design and end to end project implementations.
	Sales pursuits in North America and India in association with SAP sales team and other leads. Anchor RFP response, Solution Proposals, Commercials and System Demo to key stakeholders.
	Drive internal projects like Stellium Project execution template and templates, EWM Autonomous training modules, SAP TM system demo.
Manor Projects
Project Period	          Brief Description	
Nov 17 – June 19	 leading Home accessories and Bathroom fitting manufacture in USA
Nov 16 – Jun 17	 Distribution center in UK of leading textile product manufacturing and exporter from India
Mar 16 – Aug 16	Central Distribution center for automobile spare parts for world largest motorcycle manufacture
Sep 15- Feb 16	Leading fashion brand in India
profile_positions.title: Solution Architect - Business Applications

profile_positions.description:
Project: SAP EWM implementation for Retail client in UAE
Role: SAP EWM Sr. Consultant
Conducted the workshop for business blueprint workshop for a Retail client in UAE.
•	Presented the SAP EWM functionality, 
•	Conducted business requirements workshops, 
•	Conducted System Demo
•	Document possible enhancements, rough solution outline
•	Prepared business process document

Realization
•	Custom development in ECC to work with EWM when batch management is at plant level
•	Custom development for Gatehouse transaction to create TU and assign inbound deliveries
•	Modify RF to create mix HU and batch control
•	Inbound with Quality inspection active
•	Wave management per route
•	Loading by scanning on outbound TU
•	Modification of RF for physical inventory to make it user friendly

Business Development
•	Conduct the presentations on Westernacher Consulting for CIOs/Client IT organization and Business Process Owners. 
•	Demonstrate SAP SCM products and conduct discovery sessions with key stake holders (IT as well as Process owners)
•	Prepare High Level Function Scope Document.
•	Present Project Plan with commercials, timelines and assumptions.
